personalInformation.name: Deepu Roy
personalInformation.title: Principal Consultant - Quality Engineering & AI/ML Enablement
personalInformation.summary: Seasoned Quality Engineering leader with 15+ years driving enterprise digital transformation through AI/ML integration, advanced test automation, and agile coaching. Specialized in modernizing legacy systems, implementing ML-driven testing strategies, and leading cross-functional teams across 15+ countries for global payroll platforms.

projectHighlights.projectDescription: Led the complete overhaul of legacy testing infrastructure, implementing advanced BDD Selenium automation framework with 95% test coverage. Reduced regression testing cycles by 60% while achieving 99.8% accuracy in payroll calculations validation across 500+ test scenarios.

projectHighlights.projectName: Sweden Flow Migration - Legacy System Support
projectHighlights.projectDescription: Provided critical QA leadership during complex legacy system migration, establishing comprehensive testing protocols and validation frameworks. Ensured zero data loss and 100% functional parity during the transition, supporting business continuity for 50,000+ employees.

Pioneered ML-driven test suite optimization using predictive analytics to identify high-risk areas and optimize test execution paths. Achieved 45% reduction in test execution time while maintaining 95% defect detection accuracy through intelligent test selection algorithms.

Orchestrated enterprise-wide QA transformation across 15 countries, standardizing testing practices and implementing unified automation frameworks. Delivered 80% improvement in release confidence and established consistent quality metrics across all regional deployments.

Architected comprehensive DevOps integration strategy, implementing automated testing pipelines and quality gates. Achieved 90% reduction in production defects and 70% faster time-to-market through continuous integration and intelligent deployment validation.

keyAchievements.achievementTitle: 60% Faster Regression Cycles with AI Integration
keyAchievements.achievementDetails: Successfully implemented machine learning algorithms to optimize test suite execution, reducing regression testing time from 48 hours to 18 hours while maintaining 95% defect detection accuracy and improving overall release velocity.

keyAchievements.achievementTitle: Global QA Excellence Award - AI/ML Implementation
keyAchievements.achievementDetails: Recognized for pioneering AI-driven testing methodologies that transformed quality assurance processes across multiple business units, resulting in $2M annual savings and establishing new industry benchmarks for automated testing efficiency.

customerFeedback.customerPosition: VP of Engineering, Global Payroll Division
customerFeedback.feedbackComment: Deepu's innovative approach to AI-driven testing transformed our quality processes. His leadership in implementing ML-powered test optimization reduced our regression cycles by 60% while improving defect detection accuracy. His expertise in both technical execution and team mentoring has been invaluable to our digital transformation journey.

Working with Deepu on the Sweden Flow migration was exceptional. His comprehensive understanding of legacy system challenges combined with modern QA practices ensured a seamless transition. The automated testing frameworks he established continue to deliver consistent quality across our platform, supporting millions of payroll transactions monthly.

certifications.certificationName: Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate
